column2:
create table WebAgent --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --/H describes client program that created weblog entry: --/H program name (IE, BigBrother, Python,...) type of program (bot/browser) and class (spider, browser,..) ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- (agentID int identity (#,#) not null primary key, agentName varchar(#) not null, --/D browsers: MSIE, Konqueror, Safari Firefox, Gecko, Opera, Navigator --/D
bots: BigBrother, python, perl, java, Wget, Google, WorldWind, Gigabot,... agentPattern varchar(#) not null, --/D pattern to recognize agent in AgentString: eg: &&& class varchar(#) not null, -- ADMIN, BOT, PROGRAM, BROWSER -- OS varchar(#) not null, --/D operating system, Windows, Mac, Linux, Solaris,.. -- cpu varchar(#) not null, --/D processor: X8#, PPC, SPARC,.. -- hits int not null, --/D number of web log hits for this agent ) go
